CustomField.description: To Skip the Email alert:: Once an end user account is deemed as LOBi incumbent or change in incumbency status, Direct and Channel sales teams associated with the account has to be notified.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: To Skip the Email alert:: Once an end user account is deemed as LOBi incumbent or change in incumbency status, Direct and Channel sales teams associated with the account has to be notified.
CustomField.label: Skip LOBi Email Alert
